Translated into English by Robert Wittie, Master of Arts, Philiatr

notesStmt.note: A translation of "De calice ex antimonio sive stibio", which was printed as part of Book 4 of Primerose's "De vulgi erroribus", 1658.
Running title reads: Of the antimoniall cup.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
